detaileddescription.para: no abstraction - try use all universal controls from driver
Mixer simple element - register options - abstraction level

briefdescription.para: Return name of mixer simple element channel.

simplesect.para: channel name

briefdescription.para: Register mixer simple element class.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to returned mixer simple element class handle (or NULL)

simplesect.para: 0 on success otherwise a negative error code

briefdescription.para: Get mixer simple element identifier.
Get name part of mixer simple element identifier.

simplesect.para: name part of simple element identifier

briefdescription.para: Get index part of mixer simple element identifier.

simplesect.para: index part of simple element identifier

briefdescription.para: Find a mixer simple element.

simplesect.para: mixer simple element handle or NULL if not found

briefdescription.para: Get info about the active state of a mixer simple element.

simplesect.para: 0 if not active, 1 if active

briefdescription.para: Get info about channels of playback stream of a mixer simple element.

simplesect.para: 0 if not mono, 1 if mono

briefdescription.para: Get info about channels of playback stream of a mixer simple element.

simplesect.para: 0 if channel is not present, 1 if present

briefdescription.para: Get info about channels of capture stream of a mixer simple element.

simplesect.para: 0 if not mono, 1 if mono

briefdescription.para: Get info about channels of capture stream of a mixer simple element.

simplesect.para: 0 if channel is not present, 1 if present

briefdescription.para: Return info about capture switch control of a mixer simple element.

simplesect.para: group for switch exclusivity (see snd_mixer_selem_has_capture_switch_exclusive)

briefdescription.para: Return true if mixer simple element has only one volume control for both playback and capture.

simplesect.para: 0 separated control, 1 common control

briefdescription.para: Return info about playback volume control of a mixer simple element.

simplesect.para: 0 if no control is present, 1 if it's present

briefdescription.para: Return info about playback volume control of a mixer simple element.

simplesect.para: 0 if control is separated per channel, 1 if control acts on all channels together

briefdescription.para: Return info about capture volume control of a mixer simple element.

simplesect.para: 0 if no control is present, 1 if it's present

briefdescription.para: Return info about capture volume control of a mixer simple element.

simplesect.para: 0 if control is separated per channel, 1 if control acts on all channels together

briefdescription.para: Return true if mixer simple element has only one switch control for both playback and capture.

simplesect.para: 0 separated control, 1 common control

briefdescription.para: Return info about playback switch control existence of a mixer simple element.

simplesect.para: 0 if no control is present, 1 if it's present

briefdescription.para: Return info about playback switch control of a mixer simple element.

simplesect.para: 0 if control is separated per channel, 1 if control acts on all channels together

briefdescription.para: Return info about capture switch control existence of a mixer simple element.

simplesect.para: 0 if no control is present, 1 if it's present

briefdescription.para: Return info about capture switch control of a mixer simple element.

simplesect.para: 0 if control is separated per channel, 1 if control acts on all channels together

briefdescription.para: Return info about capture switch control of a mixer simple element.

simplesect.para: 0 if control is separated per element, 1 if control acts on other elements too (i.e. only one active at a time inside a group)
